Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Establishes an implied warranty that new homes shall be free from mold caused by defective workmanship
Summary: Establishes an implied warranty that new homes shall be free from mold caused by defective workmanship for a period of ten years from the date of sale of the new home.
LawCode: Amd ยง777-a, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to adding a housing merchant implied warranty against mold in new homes
